name: @ngx-tc/card
author: type0code
description: A card component is a versatile UI element that can effectively showcase a variety of content related to a single subject. It is typically used to display bite-sized pieces of information, such as product features, news articles, or user profiles, in a visually appealing and easily digestible format. A card can contain a mix of text, images, icons, and other multimedia elements, arranged in a hierarchy that draws the viewer's attention to the most important information first. The size and layout of a card can be customized to fit different screen sizes and resolutions, making it an ideal choice for responsive web design.
